extendedInfo.description: When you receive a SMS, the app will check if you have your phone in your pocket. If your phone is in a closed environment (in your pocket), then the phone will vibrate. If your phone is in a open environment (on the table), then the phone wont vibrate.

reviews.title: Alcatel one touch 918s
reviews.comment: Phone didn\'t vibrate for texts this app allows it to do so. Works great glad I found the app!
reviews.author: Mark Bickal

reviews.comment: Great app. Really practical. But unfortunately with the latest GB DROID X update it causes you to get duplicate of the same sms message. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Causes my phone to randomly vibrate when something goes over the proximity sensor. Has been happening with the past few versions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Five stars fot great idea;however, it doesnt work on my evo 4g. Id like this to be fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work right.
reviews.comment: About half of my texts wouldn\'t be received. My phone would vibrate, but I wouldn\'t receive the text to read. DROID X2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome concept. Doesnt work on my Samsung Epic though..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Could add an option to vibrate every minute or 5 minutes if the phone isnt taken out of the pocket.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
reviews.comment: I had spent an hour and a half on the phone with the company of my phone trying to get it to vibrate with notifications, sent 2 emails with no response and finally found this app!! It does exactly what I was missing.on my phone and all my settings were correct too!! I love it!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: I think its dumb that I even need this app. But it solved my issue. Works great on my android phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a good idea, I really want my phone to vibrate when I get texts, but this app is unreliable, doesn\'t always viberate when necessary.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great with the Motorola milestone!!! 5star!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: works fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Leo
reviews.comment: Very good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: My Droid bionic doesn\'t vibrate for texts without this app, so this is extremely helpful without having to use a new messaging app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flawless. (So far)
reviews.comment: It works on Droid 2 Global . Having it vibrate only when the phone is set to silent would be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: It\'s weird how I should have to get an app for this.... But yay! My phone now vibrates when I get txts!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works now I love it so much :D -samsung vibrant

reviews.comment: Not working in my sgs..  Uninstalled
